all_request.name: Gaming development studio is requesting some CrackDelivers to fuck up their project

all_project.name: Cloning research project
all_project.descr: Bio.division starts a huge cloning research project, the headresearcher is requesting materials for study - 500 bio.recources per week (6 weeks total) Success + 7000 credits Bio.recources prosessing upgraded to level 2, Failure +300 bio.recources compensation

all_project.name: Robotics research
all_project.descr: Chief Engineer is requesting recources for advanced robotics research 1000 tech.recources per month (2 months total) Success + 15000 credits one tech research free instant unlock, Failure +200 bio.recources and +500 credits compensation
